skills.name: Wolf Companion
skills.description: Special - Hunt with your faithful wolves.

skills.name: Lion Stance
skills.description: Stance - Increase damage dealt and damage received.

skills.name: Ancient Blood
skills.description: Passive - Increases your life and attack rating.

skills.name: Hunter's Mark
skills.description: Upgrade - Your wolves expose weaknesses in enemy defenses.

skills.name: Snake Stance
skills.description: Stance - Imbues weapons with deadly poison damage.

skills.name: Mountain King
skills.description: Passive - Increases strength, dexterity, vitality and energy.

skills.name: Bear Stance
skills.description: Stance - Greatly increases defensive fortitude.

skills.name: Wolven Guide
skills.description: Upgrade - Being near your wolves increases your power.

skills.name: Eagle Stance
skills.description: Stance - Replenish the body and focus the elements.

skills.name: Primordial Hunt
skills.description: Upgrade - Your wolves reduce elemental defences instead of physical.

skills.name: Wolf Stance
skills.description: Stance - Increases attack, hit recovery and movement speed.

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.description: Attack - Unleash a tremor followed by an aftershock.

skills.name: Upheaval
skills.description: Upgrade - Adds physical damage to your Thunder Slam.

skills.name: Thunder Slam
skills.description: Attack - Blast out a stunning thunderclap.

skills.name: Leap
skills.description: Warp - Jump over your foes.

skills.name: Heart of Stone
skills.description: Passive - Amplifies your physical prowess and nullifies your elemental power.

skills.name: Wyrmshot
skills.description: Projectile - Fire a dragon spirit that bombards nearby enemies with spines.

skills.name: Elemental Command
skills.description: Passive - Increases the elemental power of your arrows.

skills.name: Phalanx
skills.description: Projectile - Create a legion of deadly archers to attack enemies.

skills.name: Keen Sight
skills.description: Upgrade - Increases the seek range of Wyrmshot and gives critical strike chance with Bow and Crossbows.

skills.name: Scorpion Sting
skills.description: Passive - Increases your physical and poison damage.

skills.name: Impale
skills.description: Attack - A powerful strike exposing your enemy's weakness.

skills.name: Deadly Dance
skills.description: Passive - Adds your crushing blow as deadly strike.

skills.name: Noxious Mastery
skills.description: Passive - Improves Curare and your defences.

skills.name: Eviscerate
skills.description: Projectile - Throw hollow point javelins splitting into shrapnel on impact.

skills.name: Gemling
skills.description: Passive - Improves damage based on socketed gems.

skills.name: Shieldmaiden
skills.description: Passive - Increases block and grants bonuses for a short time after blocking .

skills.name: Bulwark
skills.description: Passive - Increases your physical resistance.

skills.name: Indomitable
skills.description: Passive - Improves your blocking prowess.

skills.name: Second Wind
skills.description: Upgrade - Shieldmaiden regenerates life after you block.

skills.name: Elemental Aegis
skills.description: Upgrade - Shieldmaiden grants elemental absorb after you block.

skills.name: Great Hunt
skills.description: Attack - Unleash Ban-Seth's spirits of the hunt.

skills.name: Hyena Strike
skills.description: Attack - Infectious strike that spreads damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Hunter's Prowess
skills.description: Upgrade - Takedown improves combat abilities per attack.

skills.name: Takedown
skills.description: Attack - Enter a state of fury and improve your combat abilities.

skills.name: Lioness
skills.description: Passive - Increases damage and defense.

skills.name: Pounce
skills.description: Warp Strike - Blink on top of the target, damaging nearby monsters.

skills.name: Fend
skills.description: Buff - Bulks up and fends off enemies at all sides.

skills.name: Thundermaiden
skills.description: Passive - You are enshrouded in storm, increasing your combat powers.

skills.name: Hammer of Zerae
skills.description: Projectile - An electrically charged gammer whirls around you, dealing damage in its path.

skills.name: Stormcall
skills.description: Spell - Lightning strike the earth electrocuting nearby enemies.

skills.name: Power Shift
skills.description: Projectile - Launch a short range hammer that sacrifices its piercing capabilities for greatly increased impact damage.

skills.name: Discharge
skills.description: Debuff - Periodically strikes enemies with a burst of weakening energy.

skills.name: Askari Lightning
skills.description: Spell - Conjure a devastating lightning strike.

skills.name: Lightning Shield
skills.description: Buff - Cast a protective static field that shocks attackers.

skills.name: Reckoning of Zerae
skills.description: Passive - Zerae rewards your devotion by imbuing your hammers to strike with even more force.

skills.name: Conductivity
skills.description: Upgrade - Stormcall has a chance to cast Askari Lightning on hit.

skills.name: Resistance
skills.description: Passive - Improves your defenses and blocking based on your path.

skills.name: Blood Magic
skills.description: Passive - Sacrifice your life force to obtain ruinous power.

skills.name: Magic Missiles
skills.description: Spell - Fires a wave of multiple homing magic bolts.

skills.name: Eldritch Storm
skills.description: Spell - Unleash a twister of forbidden power.

skills.name: Lava Pit
skills.description: Spell - A volcanic lake erupts under your enemies.

skills.name: Blast Radius
skills.description: Upgrade - Increases the explosion area of your Magic Missiles.

skills.name: Entropy
skills.description: Upgrade - Increases Eldritch Storm area and range.

skills.name: Hungering Flames
skills.description: Upgrade - Increases Lava Pit damage and adds healing.

skills.name: Concentrated Effect
skills.description: Buff - Decreases explorions radius but increases damage.

skills.name: Crimson Rite
skills.description: Upgrade - Increases the damage of Magic Missiles and Eldritch Storm.

skills.name: Spiritual Invocation
skills.description: Passive - Mana regeneration also increases your physical resist.

skills.name: Forbidden Knowledge
skills.description: Upgrade - Your blood spells gain a bonus to total damage at high skill levels.

skills.name: Fire Elementals
skills.description: Summon - Fire elementals with a fiery healing spell.

skills.name: Unstable Essence
skills.description: Upgrade - Summon two elementals per cast.

skills.name: Meditation
skills.description: Passive - Increases your maximum mana and mana regeneration.

skills.name: Purity
skills.description: Passive - Protects you against poison damage and curses.

skills.name: Melee Devotion
skills.description: Passive - A melee exclusive layer of damage protection.

skills.name: Freedom
skills.description: Passive - Increases defensive speeds and reduces chilled duration.

skills.name: Tenacity
skills.description: Passive - Increases physical resistance.

skills.name: Endurance
skills.description: Passive - Increases your maximum life.

skills.name: Continuity
skills.description: Passive - Increases the duration of your buff/debuff skills.

skills.name: Specialization
skills.description: Passive - Increases the skill cap of your activate [Non-Ultimate] Abilities.

skills.name: Chemistry
skills.description: Passive - Increases potion effectiveness compared to other sustain.

skills.name: Spellbind
skills.description: Curse - Enemies in front of you are petrified.

skills.name: War Spirit
skills.description: Buff - Shoots spike novas when near enemies and adds bonuses based on your devotion.

skills.name: Curare
skills.description: Passive - Adds deadly poison to your weapon and increases your poison tolerance.

skills.name: Paragon
skills.description: Passive - Grants a life bonus for each gem equipped.

skills.name: Spirit of Vengeance
skills.description: Special Summon - Raises a spirit from a corpse that summons random undead and has an aura which increases spell damage and life.

skills.name: Paragon of Fate
skills.description: Passive - High level bonuses tied to Heroic Library of Fate progression.

skills.name: Paragon of Sanctity
skills.description: Passive - High level bonuses tied to Heroic Duncraig progression.
